bill.title: Workforce Housing Communities
bill.description: Authorizes governmental entities to create workforce housing communities by creating HOAs & entering into contracts with infrastructure services companies; provides requirements for governing documents, monthly assessments, certain logs & disclosures & residents; provides for procurement, installation, & maintenance of major components of workforce housing units; requires remaining construction costs be paid for with resident provided capital; requires that certain major components be excluded from purchase transaction; authorizes certain costs to be deducted from gross proceeds of sale.
